Grand MasterAnswered 3w agoThe next crash would be a real black swan event.Most of the things we are worried abt, ETF robotic in-and-out, negative yield, Brexit, Impeachment, etc, I am not worried about them...As long as there are people worried about them, it won't be a devasting blow...The real black swan event is something most people would not realise... and I don't know what it is going to be too.... =)0 comments0
